name: ColorPalette
description: A component for displaying a color palette
note: This is a screen width component

props.name: colors
props.description: Array of colors to render in the palette

props.name: value
props.description: The value of the selected swatch

props.name: usePagination
props.description: Whether to use pagination when number of colors exceeds the number of rows

props.name: loop
props.description: Whether the colors pagination scrolls in a loop

props.name: numberOfRows
props.description: The number of color rows from 2 to 5

props.name: animatedIndex
props.description: The index of the item to animate at first render

props.name: onValueChange
props.description: Invoked once when value changes by selecting one of the swatches in the palette

props.name: swatchStyle
props.description: Style to pass all the ColorSwatches in the palette

props.name: testID
props.description: The test id for e2e tests
